title: Public referral form website field label/helper text/spacing adjustments

requirements.summary: Adjust the public referral form’s website field label text, add helper text below the input, and increase vertical spacing above the website field without changing any validation or submission behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On `/public/referral`, the website field label is exactly “Website (leave blank)” (English).
A helper text line appears immediately below the website input and reads exactly “Please leave this field empty.” (English).
There is noticeably more spacing above the website field compared to the spacing between the main referral questions (i.e., it is visually separated).
No referral form validation rules, submit handler logic, or submission behavior changes (the referral creation flow remains exactly as it is today).

file_operations.description: Update the existing website field block (use `website`; if not present in the file, apply the same UI-only changes to `company_website` instead): ensure the label text is exactly “Website (leave blank)”, add a helper text line immediately below the input reading exactly “Please leave this field empty.”, and add extra vertical spacing above this field (e.g., additional margin/padding on the website field container) to visually separate it from the main referral questions. Do not modify validation, state, submit handler, or referral creation behavior.
